author: Richard Hall, Richard Hall
title: Can you get reinfected by coronavirus after you've recovered? We asked an expert
description: Some media outlets have reported that patients have become reinfected after recovering
content:
There is no evidence that people can be reinfected by the coronavirus after recovering from it the first time, according to a virologist who studies the bodys response to the disease.
